com.hazelcast.query.impl

Class QueryContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.query.impl.QueryContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalQueryContextWithStats, PartitionQueryContextWithStats

    public class QueryContext
extends Object
    Provides the context for queries execution.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Indexes indexes 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QueryContext(Indexes indexes)
      Creates a new query context with the given available indexes.

    • Method Summary

    • Field Detail

      • indexes

        protected Indexes indexes

    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryContext

        public QueryContext(Indexes indexes)
        Creates a new query context with the given available indexes.
        Parameters:
        indexes - the indexes available for the query context.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        public Index getIndex(String attributeName)
        Obtains the index available for the given attribute in this query context.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute to obtain the index for.
        Returns:
        the obtained index or null if there is no index available for the given attribute.
